#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
string s;
int  a;

int main() {
 getline(cin, s);
 a=s.size();

  for (int i=0;i<a;i++){

  if ((s[i]=='a')or(s[i]=='e')or(s[i]=='i')or(s[i]=='o')or(s[i]=='u'))
         {printf ("%c",s[i]);
          i=i+2;}
     else printf ("%c",s[i]);

   }
return 0;}
